Sentencas: The adoption of alternative fuels and high-efficiency power systems has the potential to significantly reduce carbon emissions in maritime transportation.
Titulo: Energy and configuration management strategy for solid oxide fuel cell/ engine/battery hybrid power system with methanol on marine: A case study

Sentencas: However, there is currently limited understanding of how new power forms affect the effective payload during actual ship operations.
Titulo: Energy and configuration management strategy for solid oxide fuel cell/ engine/battery hybrid power system with methanol on marine: A case study

Sentencas: This study proposes a hybrid power system using methanol as fuel, integrating solid oxide fuel cells, an engine, and batteries.
Titulo: Energy and configuration management strategy for solid oxide fuel cell/ engine/battery hybrid power system with methanol on marine: A case study

Sentencas: A mathematical model of the system was established using a modular modeling approach, and the system's performance was evaluated based on container ship scenarios.
Titulo: Energy and configuration management strategy for solid oxide fuel cell/ engine/battery hybrid power system with methanol on marine: A case study

Sentencas: The results demonstrate that under no-refueling conditions, the hybrid power system achieves a high electrical efficiency of 58.36 %, a fuel consumption rate of 283.19 g/kWh, and carbon emissions of 389.39 g/kWh.
Titulo: Energy and configuration management strategy for solid oxide fuel cell/ engine/battery hybrid power system with methanol on marine: A case study

Sentencas: Increasing the operating temperature and reducing the current density can enhance the thermodynamic performance of the solid oxide fuel cell and the system, with electrical efficiency exceeding 60 %.
Titulo: Energy and configuration management strategy for solid oxide fuel cell/ engine/battery hybrid power system with methanol on marine: A case study

Sentencas: Solid oxide fuel cells exhibit poor load variation characteristics, taking approximately 200 s for their output voltage to decrease from 0.62 V to 0.57 V.
Titulo: Energy and configuration management strategy for solid oxide fuel cell/ engine/battery hybrid power system with methanol on marine: A case study

Sentencas: In contrast, lithium batteries demonstrate rapid load response characteristics.
Titulo: Energy and configuration management strategy for solid oxide fuel cell/ engine/battery hybrid power system with methanol on marine: A case study

Sentencas: For a single voyage, the ship requires 835.776 tons of fuel, resulting in an increase of 284.776 tons compared to diesel engines.
Titulo: Energy and configuration management strategy for solid oxide fuel cell/ engine/battery hybrid power system with methanol on marine: A case study

Sentencas: However, carbon emissions are reduced by 606.46 tons.
Titulo: Energy and configuration management strategy for solid oxide fuel cell/ engine/battery hybrid power system with methanol on marine: A case study

Sentencas: It is noteworthy that the weight and volume of the hybrid power system depend on the power distribution between the fuel cell and the engine.
Titulo: Energy and configuration management strategy for solid oxide fuel cell/ engine/battery hybrid power system with methanol on marine: A case study

Sentencas: In summary, this innovative hybrid power system provides a potent means of significantly reducing carbon emissions in the shipping industry.
Titulo: Energy and configuration management strategy for solid oxide fuel cell/ engine/battery hybrid power system with methanol on marine: A case study
